title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.72 - Otisville Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.72 - Otisville Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department an
institution to be known as the Otisville Correctional Facility, which shall be
located in Otisville, Orange County, New York. (b) Otisville Correctional Facility shall be
classified as a medium security facility for males 18 years of age or
older. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
100.72

Amended

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
